wordpressPage.content:
Purpose

More information coming soon.

Meetings

Meetings take place on the third Thursday of every month at 1 p.m. CST in the WPCampus the #diversity-inclusion Slack channel. Here is the calendar invite to the meeting.

How to join the committee

All members of the Diversity and Inclusion group must be a member of our Slack team in order to stay involved. We will use other technology from time to time but Slack will be the main outlet for discussion and a great place for the group to chat and hold meetings.

  1. Join the WPCampus #diversity-inclusion Slack channel
  2. Express your interest
  3. Attend the meetings
